response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and propel your endeavors forward. Given its unique features and unparalleled capabilities, this product is valued at $1,500,000. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000, aiming to facilitate a mutually beneficial partnership.

Please consider this offer carefully, as it represents a significant saving compared to the market value. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact me directly. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
